channel.title: [PI] corndogscape (dungeoneering, summoning)
channel.description:
Features: * assassination skill * prioritized menu clicking (isnt perfect but works good enough!) * with 99 agility you have a 33% chance to dodge a dragons fire attack and take no damage * frost dragons (use fire and can freeze) * has nomad (with proper animations) but his attacks arn't finished (when under 250 hp his attacks are faster, and under 250 hp he has a chance to heal, he can also drain some of your prayer at anytime in the fight! [and freeze you]) * 2 dungeoneering bosses * toy kite has animation * has max cape, glitched when looking at it from front though (THINKING OF REMOVING DUE TO ALL THE PROBLEMS IT CAUSES!) * holding control and pressing left or right arrow keys moves the angle you are facing * regular trees are fixed * draynor as home * dungeoneering skillcape emote * zammy invisible glitch fixed * new rs emote sprites * because i havnt fixed the pc portals respawning yet, the more damage you do the better your reward * both seed stalls at home the give a spirit shard when you steal from it * all godsword specs almost 100%! * WOODCUTTING ALMOST 100% HUGE THANKS TO emtrescue FOR http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,497636.0.html * working ring of vigour and tome of frost! * GWD monsters aggressive unless wearing Armour of there god * Dungeoneering level no longer shows up in the summoning spot in stats tab! * one memory leak possibly fixed (still testing) * removed A LOT of useless commands * 50% mining (can mine, rock doesnt disappear though, has correct anims for all but dpick and inferno adze) * Korasi sword now has special * randomly while burrying bones/using bones on altar itll spawn a rock crab (zombies dont have correct anims so i used rock crabs)-- if your lvl 138 an abyssal demon will spawn *most skills have it so you randomly get a xp lamp while training * player owned shops thanks to "PasiipaZ" * farming works better then before! (you actually get herbs) * coin bag thanks to "Aintaro" * lottery thanks to "Layne" * assassin points and vote points are no longer the same * no longer can run around with the bank open * clue scroll base added * rock tail fishing almost 100% (uses barb rod, not correct npc) * hunting grey chins kinda (use box trap on them, chins are only used for summoning or for gaining hunter xp)
Pictures: [IMG]http://i1121.photobucket.com/albums/l510/corndogs6/Readingsaraholybookhaschat.png[/img] (working on adding chat to all books, zammy and guthix now also added!) [IMG]http://i1121.photobucket.com/albums/l510/corndogs6/Newemotes.png[/img] (new emotes!) [IMG]http://i1121.photobucket.com/albums/l510/corndogs6/Lunarbenefits.png[/img] (so far 2 bonus spells on lunar, 1 that teles your straight to dung boss room [costs 150 tokens] and 1 that opens the make over interface) [IMG]http://i1121.photobucket.com/albums/l510/corndogs6/Easterringworks.png[/img] (easter ring works!) [IMG]http://i1121.photobucket.com/albums/l510/corndogs6/AssassinStore.png[/img] (the assassin store, its not 100% done yet) [IMG]http://i1121.photobucket.com/albums/l510/corndogs6/fixedthis.png[/img] (prioritized menu clicking [i personally love this!]) [IMG]http://i1121.photobucket.com/albums/l510/corndogs6/NOMAD.png[/img] (OMFG NOMAD!!!!) [IMG]http://i1121.photobucket.com/albums/l510/corndogs6/dodgingfire.png[/img] (you can dodge fire! with 99 agility) [IMG]http://i1121.photobucket.com/albums/l510/corndogs6/Dungeoneeringemote.jpg[/img] (dungeoneering emote!) [IMG]http://i1121.photobucket.com/albums/l510/corndogs6/items.jpg[/img] (some items!) [IMG]http://i1121.photobucket.com/albums/l510/corndogs6/frostdragons.jpg[/img] (frost dragons) [IMG]http://i1121.photobucket.com/albums/l510/corndogs6/gwdbossestalk.png[/img] (gwd bosses talk) [IMG]http://i1121.photobucket.com/albums/l510/corndogs6/zammyisntinvisible.jpg[/img] (no more invisibly zammy!) [IMG]http://i1121.photobucket.com/albums/l510/corndogs6/home.png[/img] (part of the new home) [IMG]http://i1121.photobucket.com/albums/l510/corndogs6/2nddungeonboss.png[/img] (so far 2 dungeoneering bosses, more to come though!) [IMG]http://i1121.photobucket.com/albums/l510/corndogs6/maxcapeglitched.png[/img] (max cape glitched, when the server is available for download i will have the fix for this in it, if you want it!) [IMG]http://i1121.photobucket.com/albums/l510/corndogs6/toykite.png[/img] (toy kite with its emote!) [IMG]http://i1121.photobucket.com/albums/l510/corndogs6/trees.png[/img] (regular trees now look normal!)
if you have any suggestions tell me
**ALSO** MORE PICS COMING SOON! especially pics of nomad!

item.title: [PI] corndogscape (dungeoneering, summoning)
item.dc:creator: @collin123456 collin123456
item.description:
@collin123456 wrote:

Features:

  • assassination skill
  • prioritized menu clicking (isnt perfect but works good enough!)
  • with 99 agility you have a 33% chance to dodge a dragons fire attack and take no damage
  • frost dragons (use fire and can freeze)
  • has nomad (with proper animations) but his attacks arn’t finished (when under 250 hp his attacks are faster, and under 250 hp he has a chance to heal, he can also drain some of your prayer at anytime in the fight! [and freeze you])
  • 2 dungeoneering bosses
  • toy kite has animation
  • has max cape, glitched when looking at it from front though (THINKING OF REMOVING DUE TO ALL THE PROBLEMS IT CAUSES!)
  • holding control and pressing left or right arrow keys moves the angle you are facing
  • regular trees are fixed
  • draynor as home
  • dungeoneering skillcape emote
  • zammy invisible glitch fixed
  • new rs emote sprites
  • because i havnt fixed the pc portals respawning yet, the more damage you do the better your reward
  • both seed stalls at home the give a spirit shard when you steal from it
  • all godsword specs almost 100%!
  • WOODCUTTING ALMOST 100% HUGE THANKS TO emtrescue FOR http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,497636.0.html
  • working ring of vigour and tome of frost!
  • GWD monsters aggressive unless wearing Armour of there god
  • Dungeoneering level no longer shows up in the summoning spot in stats tab!
  • one memory leak possibly fixed (still testing)
  • removed A LOT of useless commands
  • 50% mining (can mine, rock doesnt disappear though, has correct anims for all but dpick and inferno adze)
  • Korasi sword now has special
  • randomly while burrying bones/using bones on altar itll spawn a rock crab (zombies dont have correct anims so i used rock crabs)-- if your lvl 138 an abyssal demon will spawn
    *most skills have it so you randomly get a xp lamp while training
  • player owned shops thanks to “PasiipaZ”
  • farming works better then before! (you actually get herbs)
  • coin bag thanks to “Aintaro”
  • lottery thanks to “Layne”
  • assassin points and vote points are no longer the same
  • no longer can run around with the bank open
  • clue scroll base added
  • rock tail fishing almost 100% (uses barb rod, not correct npc)
  • hunting grey chins kinda (use box trap on them, chins are only used for summoning or for gaining hunter xp)

Pictures:
(working on adding chat to all books, zammy and guthix now also added!)
(new emotes!)
(so far 2 bonus spells on lunar, 1 that teles your straight to dung boss room [costs 150 tokens] and 1 that opens the make over interface)
(easter ring works!)
(the assassin store, its not 100% done yet)
(prioritized menu clicking [i personally love this!])

NOMAD.png763×337
(OMFG NOMAD!!!)
(you can dodge fire! with 99 agility)
(dungeoneering emote!)
(some items!)
(frost dragons)
(gwd bosses talk)
(no more invisibly zammy!)
(part of the new home)
(so far 2 dungeoneering bosses, more to come though!)
(max cape glitched, when the server is available for download i will have the fix for this in it, if you want it!)
(toy kite with its emote!)
(regular trees now look normal!)

if you have any suggestions tell me

ALSO
MORE PICS COMING SOON!
especially pics of nomad!

Read full topic
